MemoryInfobox.description: 'Another statue on the list, said Phidias, would point Kassandra to Thasos. There she'd find the hidden symbol on the Statue of Theagenes of Thasos|Theagenes.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece'

General_Description: '''The Thasian Statue''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: At [[Phidias]]' decree, Kassandra made her way to the ''[[Thasos City|chora]]'' on [[Thasos]], and sought out the [[Statue of Theagenes|statue]] of [[Theagenes of Thasos|Theagenes]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra arrived in Thasos City and came across the statue at the center of the agora. She chuckled while observing it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So this is meant to be the mighty champion Theagenes. Preserved for all time... sitting on his ass.''
She climbed on the plinth behind the statue and made a copy of the symbol of a [[bear]]'s head from the rock the statue is sitting on.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Got it!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra recovered the symbol on the statue.
